abstract: New York Observer, which rose to prominence as salmon pink broadsheet newspaper, will now be white, tabloid-sized and stapled like a magazine as part of a major redesign; change is the latest under Jared Kushner, New Jersey real estate scion who bought the paper in 2006.
lead_paragraph: The change is the latest under Jared Kushner, a New Jersey real estate scion who bought The New York Observer in 2006.

headline.main: Observer Goes Tabloid and Drops Pink
headline.print_headline: Observer Goes Tabloid and Drops Pink

snippet: The change is the latest under Jared Kushner, a New Jersey real estate scion who bought The New York Observer in 2006....
